text: Anatol' Volny (left) and Mihas' Charot Anatol' Volny (Belarusian, Анатоль Вольны, 1902 – 29 October 1937) was a Belarusian artist, poet, writer and journalist. During the Great Purge, he became a victim of the 1937 mass execution of Belarusians. Posthumously rehabilitated in 1957. ==References== * Айзенштадт Г.
